NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: The <b> Ionic Super Starter App </ b> is an extensive starter app with many ready-made pages and best practices.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_TITLE: How to use the Super Starter app
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Use and edit the functions and pages you need and delete the rest. Choose from a variety of layouts, such as login, sign up, tabs and a tutorial page.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: You need help? Check out the README file for more information.
WELCOME_INTRO: With iFarm you can easily see the animals, areas and vehicles.
